form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Ms. Lummis (for herself, Mr. Marshall, Mr. Risch, Mr. Crapo, Mrs. Capito, Mr. Justice, Mr. Barrasso, and Mr. Boozman) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources

form.official-title: To amend the Federal Lands Recreation Enhancement Act to require the acceptance of cash payments for entrance fees at units of the National Park System.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Protecting Access to Recreation with Cash Act or the PARC Act.

section.header: Acceptance of cash payments for entrance fees at units of the National Park System
section.text: Section 803(e) of the Federal Lands Recreation Enhancement Act (16 U.S.C. 6802(e)) is amended by adding at the end the following:

paragraph.text: The Secretary of the Interior shall require that any unit of the National Park System at which an entrance fee is charged in accordance with paragraph (1) accept cash as a form of payment for the entrance fee.
